reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress sparkles subtly, fits beautifully, and is comfortable, with one noting it's not scratchy at all. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality, stretchiness, and flattering design, particularly for pear-shaped figures. However, the fabric quality receives mixed reviews, with some finding it nice while others report poor quality. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Dress
items.body: It’s a beautiful dress. I bought this dress for an evening party, and I’m really happy with it. The material has a lovely velvety feel that looks elegant and feels comfortable to wear. The purple color is stunning. Read more
items.author: Simi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy dress
items.body: Wore this to a wedding. Got lots of compliments. Soft fabric, stretchy, form fitting dress with lots of sparkle. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Mary

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars NOT Sequin but still pretty
items.body: I love this dress, but It gets 4 stars because it is NOT A SEQUIN DRESS! It is thin, cheap glittery fabric. The super shiny photos are misleading. That is not what you are getting. That being said, I still love the dress. It’s over priced for the quality but whatever. The style is super flattering and it fits perfectly. Just don’t expect the dress in the photos and give it a try anyway. Read more
items.author: Kp

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't hesitate,But this beautiful dress
items.body: This dress has it all it is stretchy , very sexy,comfortable , soft not scratchy at all .The color is a Beautiful with silver sparkles.I can't say enough about this dress. I'm 165lbs 5'4" and 36DDD. Read more
items.author: kimberly hansen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right amount of sparkle
items.body: Love love love this dress! I wore this to a gala and got so many compliments. It's just the right amount of sparkle without being gaudy. It's flowy, fits great and is elegant. A night out on the town, New Year's Eve, or a wedding would be perfect places to wear this dress! Love it! Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful shimmery cocktail dress.
items.body: Beautiful shimmery black dress. Perfect fit. Very nicely made. Has a few wrinkles from being packaged but I will lightly steam iron to remove wrinkles. This dress looks great & I highly recommend it for any special occasion. Read more
items.author: NC Line Dancer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just ok.
items.body: Fits fine. Looks ok. Cheaply made, thin material. Just ok. Read more
items.author: Mrs. Phillips

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Cocktail Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Red, Navy, Blush, Darkblue, Grape, Burgundy, Lightblue, Royalblue, Rose, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
